name: Unsure
description:
During Evans childhood he made a friend named Cole,
They loved playing outside without a care in the world until.. Cole had an accident, he was hit by a car while they were playing next to the road at Cole's House.
Cole died that day and Evan became very lonely since Cole was his only friend who understood him.

Not even his parents could help him solve his loneliness.

Years later at the age of 17 Evan received a letter from an unknown company that call them selfs the PEA (Paranormal Extermination Agency).

They asked for your help with an investigation but who would believe that from someone they dont know so naturally Evan ignores them.
But at the end there was a single sentence that changed his mind.

(We know about Cole's Accident).

Signed PEA.

#horror #rpg

Gameplay:

*Turnbased BattleSystem:

The game wil have a simple rpg battle system where you go one vs one witht he enemies that you encounter during the game.

They are random encounters and boss fights toughout the story of the game

*Power Sword:

The power sword provides energy by attacking the enemy so you can use your 4 abilties to have an advantage in battle.

*Short Story:

The story in this game is pretty short one about what your going to do in this house.
You might finish the game within the hour but im working to it as a decent short experience. You will be able to save your progress at certain points incase something goes wrong or if you die, just make sure to get a fresh drink *Wink*.

Ty for visiting my page :D.

Controls WASD movement and navigation and E for interaction
